thread.title: How the AP-GfK poll on congressional leaders was conducted
thread.title_full: How the AP-GfK poll on congressional leaders was conducted - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: How the AP-GfK poll on congressional leaders was conducted
text: The Associated Press-GfK poll on the House speaker and congressional leadership was conducted by GfK Public Affairs and Corporate Communications October 15-19. No more than 1 time in 20 should chance variations in the sample cause the results to vary by more than plus or minus 3.3 percentage points from the answers that would be obtained if all adults in the U.S. were polled. ...
